function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Spread of fake news","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing measures in building design","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardized testing for uvgi effectiveness","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Extreme measures taken by citizens to prevent the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unprecedented changes and responses to business, economic, and social aspects due to the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid dispersal of covid-19 from wuhan due to travel","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential security and privacy risks in the use of digital technologies","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quality-related concerns over drug efficacy, safety, and surveillance for malaria prevention","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Occupant behavior impacting indoor environment and disease transmission routes in buildings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interaction between bacteria and gbns containing surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Multiple window opening experiments showing increased air change rates","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Authors express discomfort with using early, evolving covid-19 data at the county level, delaying the study’s publication multiple times to wait for more reliable data","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Spectrum bias in adms due to underrepresentation of geographic regions and population samples, leading to inaccurate predictions and diagnoses","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of self-sufficient living spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workforce reductions through furloughs, layoffs, and terminations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Coronavirus can spread through fecal-oral routes, requiring proper management of urban water cycle","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of spatiotemporal scale and resolution in data collection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Informal signs printed on paper with regular tape may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if not properly handled or disposed.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large public events with more than 100 participants","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social interaction in the built environment can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in confinement of covid-19 patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of upper-room uv in protecting health care workers from airborne infection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of education system","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of resources for implementing exhaustive measures in low-income developing countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of prior research on tendency and awareness towards fake news.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High airflow rates without increased outside air fraction can increase transmission potential of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research on factors influencing ppe production, distribution, and usage","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survival of covid-19 virus on surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stress risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of facial recognition and tracking technologies for crowd detection","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate pressure differential leading to potential for cross-contamination of air between safe and unsafe areas.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of incomplete evaporation of respiratory droplets in the environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of sudden risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Excess mortality of immigrants due to covid-19","category":"Social
